pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṁ paṇītānaṁ bhattānaṁ bhattapaṭipāṭi adhiṭṭhitā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.3_0: Atha kho aññatarassa daliddassa kammakārassa etadahosi—“na kho idaṁ orakaṁ bhavissati yathayime manussā sakkaccaṁ bhattaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.4_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro yena kirapatiko tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ kirapatikaṁ etadavoca—“icchāmahaṁ, ayyaputta, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.6_0: Sopi kho kirapatiko saddho hoti pasanno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.7_0: Atha kho so kirapatiko tassa daliddassa kammakārassa abbhātirekaṁ vetanaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.8_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.8_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so daliddo kammakāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.9_0: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.12_0: Bahū me badarā paṭiyattā badaramissena peyyā paripūrissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.14_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.15_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū—“daliddena kira kammakārena svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito, badaramissena peyyā paripūrissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.17_0: Assosuṁ kho manussā—“daliddena kira kammakārena buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.17_1: Te daliddassa kammakārassa pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ abhihariṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.18_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.19_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa daliddassa kammakārassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.19_1: upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.20_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro bhattagge bhikkhū parivisati. Bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.22_0: “Mā kho tumhe, bhante, ‘ayaṁ daliddo kammakāro’ti thokaṁ thokaṁ paṭiggaṇhittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.25_0: “Na kho mayaṁ, āvuso, etaṅkāraṇā thokaṁ thokaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.26_0: Api ca, mayaṁ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā; tena mayaṁ thokaṁ thokaṁ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.27_0: Atha kho so daliddo kammakāro ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.28_0: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā mayā nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.30_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa daliddassa kammakārassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.31_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.32_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.33_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.36_0: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.38_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:1.40_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.2_0: Aññataro bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṁ ādāya yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.4_0: Tassa bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto ussūre āharīyittha. So bhikkhu na cittarūpaṁ bhuñji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.8_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:2.11_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvaradānasamaye sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyādetvā bhikkhū nimantenti—“bhojetvā cīvarena acchādessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.6_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.8_0: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.9_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.10.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.14_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.16_0: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:3.17_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena aññataraṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.2_1: Atha kho te manussā bhagavato ca āyasmato ca ānandassa bhojanaṁ adaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—“
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:4.9_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, vikappetabbaṁ—‘mayhaṁ bhattapaccāsaṁ itthannāmassa dammī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.2_0: pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññataraṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñjati, etaṁ paramparabhojanaṁ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.6_0: na sakkoti ekāsane nisinno yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjituṁ. “Gilānasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.1.8_0: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.1_0: Paramparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.2_0: Paramparabhojane vematiko, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.2.3_0: Paramparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.3.6_0: sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṁ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc33:5.3.7_0: sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṁ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
